title: Crater Lake National Park: Research Vessel Ouzel
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Research Equipment     Research Vessel Ouzel                The Research Vessel Ouzel         The research boat Ouzel operating in calm waters on Crater Lake. NPS  Specifications:  19 foot, aluminum SAFE boat, circa 1997 rigid foam collar for extra floatation 175 h.p. outboard engine manual boom arm and winch for water sampling   Operations:  The Ouzel is moored at Cleetwood Cove or Wizard Island during summer operations Stored in the Wizard Island boathouse during the winter
